template.name: Template Unifi AP
template.description: This template retrieve SNMP data from Unifi AP devices. MIBS requiriments: FROGFOOT-RESOURCES-MIB IANAifType-MIB IF-MIB SNMP-FRAMEWORK-MIB SNMPv2-CONF SNMPv2-MIB SNMPv2-SMI SNMPv2-TC UBNT-MIB UBNT-UniFi-MIB
